issue.title: [Python] Remove conda builds from Travis CI processes
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-327](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-327). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I'm moving these builds to conda-forge, so we won't need to run them as part of our CI process

comments.body:
